openwebui_variables.name: RAG_AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the API key for Azure OpenAI Services when using Azure OpenAI for RAG embeddings.

openwebui_variables.name: RAG_AZURE_OPENAI_API_VERSION
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the API version for Azure OpenAI Services when using Azure OpenAI for RAG embeddings. Common values include `2023-05-15`, `2023-12-01-preview`, or `2024-02-01`.

openwebui_variables.name: RAG_AZURE_OPENAI_BASE_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the base URL for Azure OpenAI Services when using Azure OpenAI for RAG embeddings. Should be in the format `https://{your-resource-name}.openai.azure.com`.

openwebui_variables.name: RAG_EMBEDDING_ENGINE
openwebui_variables.description: Selects an embedding engine to use for RAG.
